item.title: Error: Illegal start of expression

item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

client.java:21120: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable receivedPlayerName
location: class client
                +playerName+" Reported player: "+receivedPlayerName+
                                                 ^
client.java:21121: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable rule
location: class client
                "Rule = "+rule+
                          ^
client.java:21122: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable mute
location: class client
                "Mute = "+mute);
                          ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.

item.title: Error: Illegal start of expression
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

Any Help you can provide would be greatly appreciated.

Code:

	public void LogReport() {
    Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
    int hour24 = cal.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY); // 0..23
    int min = cal.get(Calendar.MINUTE); // 0..59
    int sec = cal.get(Calendar.SECOND); // 0..59
    BufferedWriter bww = null;

    try {
        bww = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/chatlogs.txt", true));
        bww.write(
                "time: " + hour24 + ":" + min + ":" + sec + " | "
                +playerName+" Reported player: "+receivedPlayerName+
                "Rule = "+rule+
                "Mute = "+mute+);
        bww.newLine();
        bww.newLine();
        bww.flush();
    } catch (IOException ioe) {
        ioe.printStackTrace();
    } finally {
        if (bww != null) {
            try {
                bww.close();
            } catch (IOException ioe2) {}
        }
    }
}

Compiler Output:

client.java:21114: illegal start of expression
                "Mute = "+mute+);
                               ^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
